tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  time TIME,
  energy_usage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  energy_consumed FLOAT,
  device_id INT);

CREATE TABLE device_info (device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  manufacturer TEXT);

CREATE TABLE energy_costs (cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp DATE,
  cost_per_unit FLOAT,
  currency TEXT);

CREATE TABLE energy_analysis (analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  analysis_type TEXT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  result TEXT	);
